projects: [{"title":"Todo List Web Application","start_date":"Nov 2021","end_date":"Dec 2021","description":"â€¢ Developed a dynamic website that enables the user to create, edit, and track the status of each todo item on the daily basisâ€¢ Utilized HTML list elements to display the tasks, also used CSS and Bootstrap to make the UI more friendly and accessibleâ€¢ Implemented todo CRUD operations by using JavaScript event listeners consisting of arrays, objects, and class methods"},{"title":"Detecting Covid-19 with chest X-rays","start_date":"Jun 2021","end_date":"Jul 2021","description":"â€¢ Built image classification model which classifies Chest X-ray scans as one of the 3 classes- Normal, Pneumonia or Covid19â€¢ Used pre-trained ResNet18 in PyTorch with Covid-19 radiography dataset, achieving an accuracy of 92% on validation data"},{"title":"Facial Expression Recognition","start_date":"Apr 2021","end_date":"May 2021","description":"â€¢ Implemented 4 layer convolutional neural network using Keras to identify 7 facial expressions achieving an accuracy of 88%â€¢ Utilized OpenCV to automatically detect human expressions in real-time videos, employed ADAM optimizer for better resultsâ€¢ Deployed the trained model on Heroku using Flask, where the user can upload videos and get the predicted facial expression"}]
